home.title: VISIT CONGO
home.subtitle: Discover the authentic beauty of the Democratic Republic of Congo
home.heroDescription: Dive into an extraordinary journey through the natural wonders, cultural richness and breathtaking landscapes of the DRC.
home.aboutText: VISIT CONGO is a platform dedicated to promoting and enhancing the tourism heritage of the Democratic Republic of Congo. Our mission is to reveal to the world the extraordinary beauty of our country.

hero.title: Discover DRC like never before
hero.description: Explore the natural wonders, rich culture and breathtaking landscapes of the Democratic Republic of Congo.

footer.description: Your guide to discovering the wonders of the Democratic Republic of Congo.
